item.description:
Our April pick is Little Bee by Chris Cleave.

Here is a brief synopsis from Barnes and Noble of Little Bee:

From the author of the international bestseller "Incendiary" comes a haunting novel about the tenuous friendship that blooms between two disparate strangersâ€”one an illegal Nigerian refugee, the other a recent widow from suburban London.

Barnes and Noble didn't give much of a synopsis, but it is actually difficult to find out what the book is about any where you look. People don't want to give too much of it away. What we have gathered, however, is that this is a great book club discussion book because each person will interpret the events in the story differently and come to their own conclusions. We also hear that it may be a bit controversial, and a good debate never hurt any book club. I hope you enjoy it!
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the bartender or hostess.
item.name: The Portsmouth Book Club April Meetup - Little Bee
